short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display and replace the Local IP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display your local IP as a QR code. You can replace any website with a local IP, and if the current tab URL is localhost, it will be automatically replaced. This allows easy access from other devices in the local network. Eliminate the hassle of manually converting local host URLs and quickly connect by scanning QR codes directly

将您的本地IP显示为二维码。您可以替换任何网站为本地 IP, 如果当前 tab 的URL是localhost，它将被自动替换。这允许从本地网络中的其他设备轻松访问。消除手动转换本地主机URL的麻烦，并通过直接扫描二维码快速连接
